name: gneiss_v0.1
description: Hi! Thank you for your interests in using Gneiss. Gneiss is a research prototype that experiments using spreadsheets to interact with web services and create data-driven GUI applications. I have published several papers about Gneiss. You can find the papers on my website (http://www.cs.cmu.edu/~shihpinc/gneiss.html).
